data.message: Happy belated Birthday facebook. I remember I was the first person to have it out of all the people my freshman class to set up an account of highschool their all like what's facebook? Replying statement: " The best social website out there." Fb, connected me to friends that have moved far away and that made us able to figure out how to meet up to visit again, I connected with family members who live in other states across the U.S. relatives in Germany, Australia, and foreign exchange students I became friends with during high school. Thank you Mark Zuckerberg love to all the creators <3

replies.message: Thank you, Carmen!  We're happy to be able to connect people across the globe.  Thank you for helping us reach this milestone and for being a part of our wonderful community. - Jenny
Thank you so much for the movie, it is awesome!Happy Birthday!
its not my movie ha this was fun to read though.
